page.title: 18STANION MAY DAY
page.content: The May Queen each year is elected by the children of the school.The Queen is always a fourth year girl.Our May Day is usually a day in the middle of the month so that we have time to rehearse and hopefully,the weather is likely to be better.The May Queen has to prepare a speech which will show her thanks to the children who voted for her and to the person who made the cake. This is what 1985's programme looked like. {2.00p.m.}Children assemble on the playground to the song "Lord of the Dance" The scene is set. The crowning of Vivienne Chudley as May Queen by her aunt Mrs Davies. May Queens's speech.
